data.title: Fast food robot
data.statement:
You work for a burger fast food restaurant. 

Ingredients are arranged randomly side by side in the rack of a fridge [[fridgeRack]]. 
A robot must place them in order on a treadmill which goes towards the kitchen so operators can build the burgers.

The burger is constructed like this from top to bottom :

`- a upper bun : ︵
- a slice of cheddar : ---
- OPTIONALLY a potato pancake : —
- a steak : <>
- ketchup : ~~~
- a lower bun : ︶`

<<Please note that operators builds the burger from the bottom to the top.>>

Output the correct [[order]] of ingredients for the robot to place on the treadmill.
If required ingredients are missing in the [[fridgeRack]] please output {{missing ingredients}}.
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> a string [[fridgeRack]] representing the ingredients in the fridge, separated by a space. There are no duplicated ingredients.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> The [[order]] of the ingredients to put on the kitchen treadmill, separated by a space. 0 means the first ingredient, 1 means the second, and so on. If any required ingredient is missing, output {{missing ingredients}} instead.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You work for a burger fast food restaurant.

Ingredients are arranged randomly side by side in the rack of a fridge fridgeRack.
A robot must place them in order on a treadmill which goes towards the kitchen so operators can build the burgers.

The burger is constructed like this from top to bottom :

- a upper bun : ︵
- a slice of cheddar : ---
- OPTIONALLY a potato pancake : —
- a steak : <>
- ketchup : ~~~
- a lower bun : ︶


Please note that operators builds the burger from the bottom to the top.

Output the correct order of ingredients for the robot to place on the treadmill.
If required ingredients are missing in the fridgeRack please output missing ingredients.
Input
Line 1 : a string fridgeRack representing the ingredients in the fridge, separated by a space. There are no duplicated ingredients.
Output
Line 1 : The order of the ingredients to put on the kitchen treadmill, separated by a space. 0 means the first ingredient, 1 means the second, and so on. If any required ingredient is missing, output missing ingredients instead.
Constraints
Example
Input
~~~ ︶ ︵ --- <>
Output
1 0 4 3 2
